verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:17
verses.text: And he said, What is the thing that the Lord hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide it not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide any thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:18
verses.text: And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the Lord: let him do what seemeth him good.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 3:19
verses.text: And Samuel grew, and the Lord was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.
